MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA2 postcode area of Paisley, affecting properties in Barterholm Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of it and only became aware of this at 9.59AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault at Barterholm Road substation. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10.45AM on 22 November 2020.
